Dad reveals horrific details of baby’s reported fentanyl overdose at playground

A 10-month-old baby suffered an accidental fentanyl overdose at a San Francisco playground and was given Narcan by paramedics, according to his father. The father described the incident and shared a hospital report that confirmed the overdose.
A giant sea cow once roamed the coast. Here’s how it changed California’s ecology

A giant sea cow that weighed twice as much as a hippo was very good for the vital kelp forests off California’s coast, a new report says. The creature went extinct in the 1700s, shortly after Europeans arrived.
